title: Knockdown of ACOT4 alleviates gluconeogenesis and lipid accumulation in hepatocytes

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Qianqian Yuan, Xiaomin Zhang, Xiaonan Yang, Qing Zhang, Xiang Wei, Zhimin Ding, Jiajie Chen, Hongting Hua, Dake Huang, Yongxia Xu, Xiuyun Wang, Chaobing Gao, Shengxiu Liu, Huabing Zhang
